title: The Week of Ursula Yang: Senior Superhero
summary: Ursula Yang, a 77-year-old with a passion for marketing and guiding, discovers her superpowers and saves her community from a mysterious threat over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Ursula Yang, eine 77-jährige mit einer Leidenschaft für Marketing und Führung, entdeckt ihre Superkräfte und rettet ihre Gemeinde vor einer mysteriösen Bedrohung im Laufe einer Woche.
summaryDutch: Ursula Yang, een 77-jarige met een passie voor marketing en gidsen, ontdekt haar superkrachten en redt haar gemeenschap van een mysterieuze bedreiging gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Ursula Yang, une passionnée du marketing et du guidage de 77 ans, découvre ses super pouvoirs et sauve sa communauté d'une menace mystérieuse au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Realizing her special ability to manipulate emotions with her persuasive words while leading a tour, Ursula feels energetic and uplifted.
Ursula successfully calms a distressed crowd using her soothing tone and precise words, feeling triumphant.
A sudden and eerie silence falls over the town square as Ursula detects an unseen threat, using her newly found senses.
Facing the invisible menace, Ursula channels her inner strength and devises a strategic marketing plan to alert and organize the community.
With her plan in motion, Ursula witnesses the community coming together harmoniously; she feels peaceful yet vigilant.
The threat neutralized through her guiding skills and quick thinking, Ursula enjoys a celebratory atmosphere, filled with happiness and gratitude from the townsfolk.
Reflecting on her week, Ursula realizes that age is merely a number when it comes to making a significant impact, feeling romantic about her lifelong passions for marketing and guiding.

ending: In the quiet glow of Sunday evening, Ursula Yang smiled, knowing her journey as a superhero was just beginning.
moral: No matter the age, one's unique abilities can shine through and safeguard the community.
